mapper.select: select count(*) from class c join confirm cf ON c.clno = cf.clno where cf.cfcd = '승인'

select clno, cltitle, cllevel, aid from ( select rownum n, c.clno, c.cltitle, c.cllevel, c.aid from class c join confirm cf ON c.clno = cf.clno where cf.cfcd = '승인' order by c.clno ) a
where a.n between #{start} and #{end}

choose.when: clno like '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=NUMERIC } || '%' or cltitle like '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR } || '%' or cllevel like '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR } || '%' or aid like '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR } || '%'

mapper.select: SELECT c.* FROM class c JOIN confirm cf ON c.clno = cf.clno WHERE c.clno = #{clno} AND cf.cfcd = '승인'
